channel.title: 2 noob problems i need help with
channel.description:
1. change the drop rate from the barrows chest. so my barrows when i get all 6 keys and use with chest it gives a random barrow peice everytime i wanna change this so you get a barrow peice like 5% of the time
2. make a new minigame telething. k so you know how on a delta source when you click mingame's and then 5 teles pop up well i wanna make a new one for minigames tele 2 but i cant add the 5 different teles help please =]

item.title: 2 noob problems i need help with

i dont understand number 2[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2009, 12:15:49 am[/size][hr]help pleasE??

item.source: 2 noob problems i need help with

item.title: 2 noob problems i need help with
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

  1. Example;

int[] items = { 7462, 7462, 7462, 7462, 4708, 4710, 4712, 4714, 4716, 4718, 4720, 4722, 4724, 4726, 4728, 4730, 4732, 4734, 4736, 4738, 4745, 4747, 4749, 4751, 4753, 4755, 4757, 4759 } int chance = Misc.random(100); if (chance > 95) { p.item.addItem(items[Misc.random(27)], 1); } p.item.addItem(565, Misc.random(100)); p.item.addItem(558, Misc.random(800)); p.item.addItem(560, Misc.random(200)); p.item.addItem(562, Misc.random(300)); p.item.addItem(4740, Misc.random(80)); p.item.addItem(995, Misc.random(4000)); p.barrowsCount = 0;

  1. Edit one of the remaining strings on the interface he uses for teleporting, and add the teleport for the button in the button packet (185).

Read full topic
